data.title: Walter Jon Williams
data.text:
Born: 15-Oct-1953

Birthplace: Duluth, MN

Gender: Male

Race or Ethnicity: White

Occupation: Novelist

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: Hardwired

Science fiction author.

University: BA, University of New Mexico (1975)

Author of books:

To Glory Arise (1981, novel, "The Privateer", Privateers and Gentlemen)

The Tern Schooner (1981, novel, "The Yankee", Privateers and Gentlemen)

Brig of War (1981, novel, "The Raider", Privateers and Gentlemen)

The Macedonian (1981, novel, Privateers and Gentlemen)

Cat Island (1981, novel, Privateers and Gentlemen)

Ambassador of Progress (1984, novel)

Knight Moves (1985, novel)

Hardwired (1986, novel, Hardwired)

Voice of the Whirlwind (1987, novel, Hardwired)

The Crown Jewels (1987, novel, Majistral)

House of Shards (1988, novel, Majistral)

Angel Station (1989, novel)

Solip:System (1989, novel, Hardwired)

Facets (1990, short stories)

Elegy for Angels and Dogs (1990, novel)

Days of Atonement (1991, novel)

Aristoi (1992, novel)

Rock of Ages (1995, novel, Majistral)

Metropolitan (1995, novel, Metropolitan)

City on Fire (1997, novel, Metropolitan)

Frankensteins and Foreign Devils (1998, short stories)

The Rift (1999, novel)

The Praxis (2002, novel, Dread Empire)

The New Jedi Order: Destiny's Way (2002, novel)

The Sundering (2003, novel, Dread Empire)

The Orthodox War (2004, novel, Dread Empire)

Do you know something we don't?

Submit a correction or make a comment about this profile
